Reviews.Title: “Rimini Hotel, Rome”
Reviews.Author: ShilpiDas
Reviews.Content: nice hotel bang opposite termini station lots food joints nearby 2 mins walk metro station termini clean simple looks little tired bathroom tiny pretty hard move lacks basic amenities teacoffe kettle etc staff helpful chatty nice tips stay safe decent food breakfast simple nice selection spread lick fresh paint nice upholstery spice

Reviews.Title: “Good Honest Budget Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Wilkdz
Reviews.Content: expecting luxury price decent hotel location walking main tourist attractions looking close action reconsider staying campo de fiori suit found location perfect street opposite termini station noisy nice evening meal agree reviewers definitely 30 steps hotel entrance dated suited fine bed slept albeit slightly hard wardrobe store clothes albeit falling apart plug sockets hanging wall bit huge mirror front dresser mirror fixed wall ridiculous angle pay peanuts expect fine means luxury emailed hotel arrived requested terrace lucky recieve move terrace weather extra living space hotel staff friendly extremely helpful previous reviewers commented breakfast agree pretty poor morning grabbed coffee waitress coffee leave terrible croissants ate terrace

Reviews.Title: “spot on”
Reviews.Author: sue m
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights february clean comfortable quiet breakfasts fab plenty choice staff lovely especially helpful reception lift character rest hotel break fixed day bathroom adequate gripe teacoffee facilities definitely recommend

Reviews.Title: “comfy beds!! thats all !!”
Reviews.Author: Michaela H
Reviews.Content: thats positive emailed specifically booked partners 40th ignored 9am left morning effort replenish told fixed wasnt frozen 1 basic shoe box bathroom 603 requested nice didnt basically pay wouldnt staff abrupt beds comfy slept hand amazing

Reviews.Title: “Loved this hotel.”
Reviews.Author: bandbwilltravel
Reviews.Content: located street opposite train station bus terminus terravision bus drops picks romes airports train station eat lots caferestaurants reasonable thirty minutes walk colosseum trevi fountain opposite direction reception dining staff friendly helpful buffet breakfast available 710am plentiful selection hot cold foods drinks hotel nice warm spotlessly clean nice required including air conditioningheating bathroom shower hair dryer lovely terrace unexpected bonus time didnt chance definately return hotel

Reviews.Title: “Nice clean place, 100m from Main Railway station, best breakfast coffee”
Reviews.Author: kevyt
Reviews.Content: clean handy main railway station access metro access rome staff speak english helpful laundromat 400m nice little bars close tourist restaurants ok dont expect frills comfortable located value money ive stayed twice lift adds charm breakfast coffee elderly gentleman world

Reviews.Title: “One star for this hotel”
Reviews.Author: LucyB28
Reviews.Content: hotel close station smelt bad cigarettes moved smoking apparently smoking rome smoke moved little smoked packet cigarettes woke shower head bath wasnt attached wall hold attempting shower included flooding bathroom time idea classed star hotel losing nights accommodation moving hotels couldnt bare breathing tobacco fumes oh slept floor beds hard mention 2 single beds pushed

Reviews.Title: “A surprise very close to the Termini Station”
Reviews.Author: Naples64
Reviews.Content: 1 night coming venice flying rome airport morning chosen hotel proximity railway station close easy spacious balcony beautifully decorated spa bath bath shower water shower little hard contain shower curtain major issue told leave 515am morning organised breakfast delivered cant service

Reviews.Title: “Not to be recommended”
Reviews.Author: Rousesonholiday
Reviews.Content: hotel located close roma termini firstly trouble finding entrance sign posted walking level dark ok size walls paper thin hear toilets flushed night staff dismissive unhelpful locked twice hadnt correct dates stay apology safe hotel upgrade dated breakfast average

Reviews.Title: “How much are you prepared to pay for convenience?”
Reviews.Author: Jag-u-rs
Reviews.Content: convenience proximity station hotel stayed twice period week booked people leave bathroom dry ourselves cheap breakfast ok

Reviews.Title: “Great stay, great location Rimini Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Robyn0704
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights april hotel walking distance termini station hotel nicely renovated decorated bathrooms comfortable quiet french doors courtyard nice view outside shutters closed privacy quiet airconditioning breakfast 5th floor outlook typical european breakfast coffee lift squeeze 2 people suitcases lift free wifi lounge 1st floor plenty shops cafes restaurants immediate vicinity including termini stazione friendly helpful staff

Reviews.Title: “great location - huge bathroom!”
Reviews.Author: BertienBryce
Reviews.Content: strangely mixed door stayed due mix dates ours hotel moved final night actually meant taking bags flight stairs applies equally location breakfast friendly staff short break allocated huge biggest bathroom hotel nice surprise

Reviews.Title: “Superb service and location”
Reviews.Author: 40nt0ur
Reviews.Content: little worried read reviews location ideal bit worried day night easy transfer airport trains buses metro walking rome staff incredibly helpful friendly especially matteo real star yes carpet worn lift spotlessly clean comfortable warm breakfast plentiful staff friendly helpful definitely stay lots restaurants try food atmosphere tourist set meal particularly value

Reviews.Title: “Thumbs up hotel”
Reviews.Author: IngerBonde
Reviews.Content: lovely near termini station walking distance surprised size especially bathroom pictures stairwell penetration carpet write hand breakfast romans restaurant respect italian food fantastic lunch ready experience roma hotel 5 days 4 nights gladly

Reviews.Title: “A good choice of the many 3-star hotels next to the rail station.”
Reviews.Author: 5murrell
Reviews.Content: main reason staying closeness railway station block nearly building hotel choice class accommodation reception friendly helpful clean comfortable en suite modern clean restaurant top floor provided breakfast choice limited tiny oldfashioned elevator guests hotel provides free wifi hot spot floor restaurants neighbourhood easy evening meal

Reviews.Title: “Well located, friendly staff, clean and comfortable small hotel”
Reviews.Author: TwoAussieBabyBoomers
Reviews.Content: friend 2 baby boomer ladies started 1 month experience italy hotel hotel close station rome convenience stayed 2 nights arrival 1 night flying catching trains rome hotel close 5 minutes walk restaurants able walk historic sites comfortably breakfasts comfortable required twin arrive flight available able leave luggage reception ready recommend stay city accommodation reasonable rate

Reviews.Title: “Ever reliable”
Reviews.Author: helsaAustralia
Reviews.Content: representative 3 star category stayed 5 times 2006 beds bathrooms tiny clean lucky terrace makes accommodation bigger street noise muted double glazing wish shut desk staff helpful ave seen evidence rudeness breakfast plentiful variety acceptable convenient trains buses bad described railway stations attract crowd lots buy coffee meal including excellent self service gusto station

Reviews.Title: “Hidden Gem!”
Reviews.Author: Disjecta
Reviews.Content: lucked florence hotel slightly near rome termini station metro bustram terminal 100m weve heard infamous stories somewhat rough neighbourhood fears unfounded hotel staff round friendly helpful romes standards upgraded airconditioned wellsized clean view uninteresting lack word rooftop garden looks recently renovated breakfast served 5th floor exceptional alright cappuccino coffee serve awful wifi internet free cheap euro hour note reception tv floor adjacent water pipe system night rome seriously exhaust fell asleep trouble

Reviews.Title: “Surprisingly good”
Reviews.Author: feedbackthetruth
Reviews.Content: close termini train station hotel share space hotel door value money expensive supposedly 4 star hotels similar nice bathroom appeared recently renovated reception staff friendly breakfast usual fare fresh coffee spoke italian wise automatic machine definitely stay night travelling train

Reviews.Title: “Convient & comfortable”
Reviews.Author: 45annie
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel times comfortable breakfast required terrace hotel metres rome terminal station easy catch regional trains metro italy supermarket station lots shops stayed 5 days staff friendly helpful stay rome recommend hotel friends price reasonable
